revision.text:
==Controls==
Space Bar - Start Dungeon/Gym, Open Chest/Start Boss fight in Dungeon
1, 2, 3, 4 - Start respective Elite Four trainer battles
5 - Start Region Champion trainer battle
WASD - Move in Dungeon/Safari
Arrow Keys - Move in Dungeon/Safari
- Go to previous route (by number)
=/+ Go to next route (by number)
O - Open Oak Items menu
Alphanum / Numberpad 1 to 0 - Equip / remove corresponding item in the Oak Items menu
